trustfund: TF021917-OTF - PPA FOR CHINA ODS II,TF021981-OTF-CHINA ODS II

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Montreal Protocol Ozone
            Depleting Substances Phaseout Project will: (a) support the
            adoption and commercialization of 50 percent reduced Ozone
            Depleting Substances foam applications through the
            implementation of cost-effective priority projects; and (b)
            further develop the project implementation mechanism through
            local institutions.
